body:
### What you need to do

Use this form to tell the court whether you support this application.

You should complete this form within 14 days from the day you were told about the application.

It usually takes about 5 minutes.
heading: Respond to a property and financial affairs application
lede: A property and financial affairs application has been made to the Court of Protection. They will decide whether to appoint a deputy to make these types of decisions on behalf on someone if they lack capacity.
